title: Prominent Trump Critic Adam Kinzinger Won’t Seek Re-Election
sub_head: GOP lawmaker, one of two Republicans on panel probing Jan. 6 riot, recently had his district redrawn
body:
WASHINGTON—Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R., Ill.), one of 10 GOP lawmakers who voted to impeach then President Donald Trump on a charge of inciting an insurrection at the Capitol, said on Friday that he wouldn’t run for re-election next year.
Mr. Kinzinger’s decision comes as he was increasingly at odds with members of his own party, many of whom remain loyal to Mr. Trump, and as he faced a tough re-election fight for his seventh term in the House after his district was redrawn.
